cement.description: The amount of cement used in the concrete mix (kg/m^3)

blast_furnace_slag.description: The amount of blast furnace slag used as a supplementary cementitious material in the concrete mix (kg/m^3)

fly_ash.description: The amount of fly ash used as a supplementary cementitious material in the concrete mix (kg/m^3)

water.description: The amount of water used in the concrete mix (kg/m^3)

superplasticizer.description: The amount of superplasticizer used in the concrete mix (kg/m^3)

coarse_aggregate.description: The amount of coarse aggregate used in the concrete mix (kg/m^3)

fine_aggregate.description: The amount of fine aggregate used in the concrete mix (kg/m^3)

age.description: The age of the concrete in days at which the concrete compressive strength is calculated

concrete_compressive_strength.description: The compressive strength of the concrete (MPa)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in material science and engineering.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the composition and age of the concrete, please predict the concrete compressive strength.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in material science and engineering.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the composition of the concrete and its compressive strength, please predict the age of the concrete.
prompt.answer_prompt: The age of the concrete is {age}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in material science and engineering.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the other components and properties of the concrete, please predict the amount of cement in the mix.
prompt.answer_prompt: The amount of cement in the mix is {cement}.
